title: The Mysterious Legend of Napoleon Dugoute
description: The story of Napoleon Dugoute, a wise black fellow who gets reluctant white people to do things.
quote: America is kind of like this here crab apple tree, John Fitzgerald Kennedy.
altHero: Tracy Jordan with silver curly hair as Napoleon Dugoute
alt1: Dugoute and a young boy in a newscap sit and talk on some barrels
alt3: Dugoute speaks to a boy next to a tree
alt4: the boy looks up at Dugoute
